mapper.select: select id,name,id_number,phone_number,gender,dept_name,position_name from employee,position,department where employee.id=#{id} and employee.dept_id=department.dept_id and employee.position_id=position.position_id

select award_punish.id,employee_id,employee_name,dept_name,position_name,award_reason,award_money,punish_reason,punish_money,time from award_punish,position,department where award_punish.position_id=position.position_id and award_punish.dept_id=department.dept_id

select award_punish.id,employee_id,employee_name,dept_name,position_name,award_reason,award_money,punish_reason,punish_money,time from award_punish,position,department where award_punish.employee_id=#{employee_id} and award_punish.time=#{date} and award_punish.position_id=position.position_id and award_punish.dept_id=department.dept_id
mapper.update: update award_punish set employee_name=#{award_punish.employee_name}, dept_id=#{award_punish.dept_id}, position_id=#{award_punish.position_id}, award_reason=#{award_punish.award_reason}, award_money=#{award_punish.award_money}, punish_reason=#{award_punish.punish_reason}, punish_money=#{award_punish.punish_money}, time=#{award_punish.time} where employee_id=#{award_punish.employee_id} and time=#{award_punish.time}
mapper.delete: delete from award_punish where employee_id=#{employee_id} and time=#{date}
